comment.author: 34918130@N07
comment._content: Wonderful Photo's of Eide Kommune.   My GGGGrandfather was Fredrik Eriksen Eide. (he drowned in the Fjord while attempting to move a building across the Fjord.      One daughter died from the fever  and was married to Nils Nilsson Folkedal.    Then Folkedal married the other daughter.    Can you direct me to the accurate story ???    Mange Takk.
